Title: Lying Down with Dogs
Plot: The world of illegal dog fighting is explored by Grissom and the rest of the team when they take on the case of a wealthy socialite who was murdered.  Meanwhile, Warrick struggles to clear his name in the recent exotic dancer murder case.
ParentalRatingReason: R16 Violence and content that may disturb
GuestStars: Roy Jackson, Tim Kelleher, Jamie Luner, Jesse Borrego, Mark L. Young, Rebecca Budig, John Capodice, Zack Ward, Dennis Christopher, Maxie J. Santillan Junior, Vincent Laresca, Maria Russell, Chris DeRose, Nelson M
